ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.protocols

Class NullDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.protocols.NullDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPinIn, IPinOut

    public class NullDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPinIn, IPinOut
    Dummy input device which generates 0 as values. This can be used e.g. in unit tests.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
